data.prayer: Father, reveal yourself to a faithful non-believer today, someone like Cornelius, and then Father please connect him with the church in Liupanshui, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: Cornelius answered: “Three days ago I was in my house praying at this hour, at three in the afternoon. Suddenly a man in shining clothes stood before me and said, ‘Cornelius, God has heard your prayer and remembered your gifts to the poor."

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Liupanshui, Guizhou, China
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Father, help the 19,109 believers in Liupanshui to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the county of Liupanshui, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Liupanshui to exponentially multiply disciples.
Spirit, I pray that the Nasu, Panxian people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Lord, raise up apostolic workers to plant churches in every town in the county of Liupanshui.
data.verse: The reason I left you in Crete was that you might put in order what was left unfinished and appoint elders in every town, as I directed you.

data.prayer: Father, please raise up every one you have called in Liupanshui, Guizhou, China to become worthy of their calling, and offer spiritual sacrifices acceptable to you through Jesus.
data.verse: I urge you to live a life worthy of the calling you have received

data.section_summary:
the county of Liupanshui, Guizhou, China has a population of 251,900.

We estimate Liupanshui has 19,109 people who might know Jesus, 4,069 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 228,721 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 13 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Liupanshui, Guizhou, China.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
